attributes.action: Micro Chip all illigal immigrants who are found in Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Immigration/Police officers find illigal immigrants/assylum seekers they should be micro chiped.  At present while they are being investigated they are freed from custody and requested to report to a particular police station on a regular basis. They never do. This way the system can keep better records on how many we have in our country at any given time and know where they are if/when deportation is required.
